name: MKLocalSearchCompletion
desc: A fully-formed string that completes a partial string.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title string associated with the point-of-interest.

items.name: var subtitle: String
items.desc: The subtitle (if any) associated with the point-of-interest.

items.name: var titleHighlightRanges: [NSValue]
items.desc: The ranges of characters to highlight in the title string.

items.name: var subtitleHighlightRanges: [NSValue]
items.desc: The ranges of characters to highlight in the subtitle string.
